title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Title: Travelhouse 21" Hardside Spinner Carry-On Luggage – Sleek, Lightweight & Secure

Description: Glide through the airport with ease and style with the Travelhouse 21" Hardside Underseat Carry-On Luggage. This compact and lightweight suitcase is ideal for short trips, business jaunts, or weekend getaways, offering a 33L capacity to accommodate your essentials. Crafted from resilient ABS hardshell with a robust steel rod, this luggage is built to withstand the rigors of travel. The silent double spinner wheels offer 360-degree navigation, ensuring a smooth roll across various terrains.

Security isn't compromised, as this case features a TSA-approved lock to safeguard your belongings. Available in a vibrant spectrum of colors – Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple – it's as much a fashion statement as it is a functional travel companion. With dimensions of 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" and weighing just 5.62lb, it fits comfortably under the seat or in overhead compartments. Travel in confidence with this durable, maneuverable, and stylish hardshell suitcase from Travelhouse.

Specifications:
- Material: ABS HardShell, Steel
- Available Colors: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple
- Dimensions: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H)
- Weight: 5.62lb
- Capacity: 33L

Features:
- Durable ABS material: Impact-resistant and lightweight for effortless travel.
- Silent, smooth 360-degree spinner wheels: Navigate airports with ease.
- Adjustable steel pull rod: Customizable comfort for travelers of all heights.
- TSA-approved lock: Keep your possessions secure.
- Elegant textured finish: Resists scratches and maintains a polished look trip after trip.
- Organized interior: Mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps for efficient packing.

Title: Travelhouse Ultra-Light 20" Hardside Spinner Carry-On – Silent Wheels & TSA Lock

Description: Glide effortlessly through your travels with the sleek Travelhouse 20-inch Underseat Carry-On Luggage. Crafted for durability and ease, the tough ABS hardshell and sturdy steel rod ensure your belongings are safely cocooned within a robust exterior. With a substantial 33L capacity, this compact suitcase is perfect for short trips, offering ample space for essentials. Navigate busy terminals with ease thanks to the silent, 360-degree double spinner wheels, providing smooth mobility across any surface. For added security, a built-in TSA lock guards your valuables, giving you peace of mind. Available in a vibrant palette including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, this lightweight luggage weighs just 5.62lb, making it an ideal travel companion for those seeking style and convenience.

Specifications:
- Material: ABS Hardshell, Steel Rod
- Available Colors: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple
- Dimensions: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H)
- Weight: 5.62lb
- Capacity: 33L

Features:
- Robust 100% ABS construction: Impact and scratch-resistant, yet light.
- Silent, multi-directional spinner wheels: Smooth 360-degree movement for stress-free travel.
- Comfortable handling: TPR soft handle and adjustable steel pull rod for easy lifting and pulling.
- Sophisticated and functional design: Textured finish for a lasting, elegant look; adjustable pull rod with three height settings.
- Thoughtfully organized interior: Mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to secure items, maximizing packing capacity.

Title: Travelhouse 20" Premium Underseat Hardshell Carry-On with Silent Spinner Wheels - Vibrant & Durable

Description: Elevate your travel experience with the Travelhouse 20" Underseat Hardshell Carry-On, a lightweight and robust suitcase designed for the modern traveler. Whether embarking on a business trip, a weekend getaway, or heading back to campus, this compact luggage piece offers the perfect blend of style and practicality. Available in a spectrum of colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, it's sure to stand out in the baggage carousel.

Constructed with a tough ABS hard shell and reinforced with a smooth steel rod, this suitcase can withstand the rigors of travel while maintaining a sleek appearance. Measuring 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" and weighing a mere 5.62lb, it's designed to fit comfortably under your seat while offering a generous 33L packing capacity - ideal for trips lasting 1-3 days.

Navigate effortlessly through busy terminals with the 360-degree silent double spinner wheels, ensuring smooth and quiet mobility. Security is also paramount with the inclusion of a TSA-approved lock to safeguard your belongings.

Specifications:

- Material: Premium ABS Hardshell, Durable Steel Rod
- Available Colors: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple
- Dimensions: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H)
- Weight: 5.62lb

Features:

- Superior Protection: Crafted from high-impact-resistant and scratch-proof ABS material for long-lasting use.
- Effortless Handling: Glide smoothly on any surface with 4 silent multi-directional spinner wheels and enjoy a comfortable grip with the TPR soft handle.
- Adjustable and Sturdy: The stainless steel pull rod can be set at three different heights to suit your needs.
- Smart and Secure Packing: The interior boasts a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps for organized packing, complemented by a textured finish that keeps the exterior looking pristine.

Choose the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry-On for a travel companion that combines elegance, efficiency, and security. Get ready to explore in style!

Title: Travelhouse 20" Underseat Hardside Carry-On with Spinner Wheels – Sleek, Durable & Silent

Experience the perfect fusion of durability and maneuverability with the Travelhouse 20" Underseat Hardside Carry-On, your ultimate travel companion. Designed for the modern traveler, this lightweight suitcase is ideal for short trips, business jaunts, and school returns, offering a seamless blend of style and functionality.

Crafted from robust ABS material known for its impact and scratch resistance, this carry-on is not only tough but also impressively light at just 5.62 pounds. The ample 33L capacity ensures that your essentials are neatly packed and ready for a 1-3 day getaway.

Gliding effortlessly on silent, smooth 360-degree spinner wheels, this suitcase handles effortlessly on various terrains. Paired with a comfortable TPR soft handle and an adjustable stainless steel pull rod, every aspect of this luggage speaks to quality and convenience.

The Travelhouse carry-on comes in an array of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, sure to make a statement wherever you go. Its elegant textured finish not only adds to its visual appeal but also maintains its pristine look trip after trip.

Security is paramount, which is why this suitcase is fitted with a TSA lock to safeguard your belongings. Inside, you'll find an organized interior with a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps, ensuring everything stays in place.

Dimensions: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H)
Weight: 5.62lb
Capacity: 33L

Elevate your travel experience with the Travelhouse 20" Underseat Hardside Carry-On – where elegance meets practicality for the discerning traveler.
